SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE BOARD_REPORT_COUNT > 0
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND LOWER(B.BOARD_TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{board_tag_name}||'%'

select rn, board_no, member_no, board_title, board_content, member_nick, board_date, board_report_count FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT M.MEMBER_NO,B.BOARD_NO,B.BOARD_CONTENT,B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_DATE,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT,M.MEMBER_NICK FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and board_report_count > 0 order by board_report_count DESC )A )WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT rn, board_no, board_group_no, board_tag_name, board_title, board_date, board_hit_count, board_like_count, board_report_count, board_file_check, bgroup_name, member_nick, board_comment_count FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_GROUP_NO ,B.BOARD_TAG_NAME ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_DATE ,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT ,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK ,G.BGROUP_NAME ,M.MEMBER_NICK ,COUNT(C.BOARD_NO) AS board_comment_count
FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN BGROUP G ON B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = G.BOARD_GROUP_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BCOMMENT C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = #{board_group_no}
AND B.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND REGEXP_LIKE (B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, '^HTML|^JAVA|^CSS|^C|^JS|^SQL|^PYTHON')
AND LOWER(B.BOARD_TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{board_tag_name}||'%'
GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_GROUP_NO, B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_DATE,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK,G.BGROUP_NAME,M.MEMBER_NICK
ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY board_comment_count DESC
) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT RN, NOTI_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_DATE, NOTI_HIT_COUNT, NOTI_FILE_CHECK FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT N.NOTI_NO ,N.MEMBER_NO ,M.MEMBER_NICK ,N.NOTI_TITLE ,N.NOTI_CONTENT ,N.NOTI_DATE ,N.NOTI_HIT_COUNT ,N.NOTI_FILE_CHECK
FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO

AND N.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE N.NOTI_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR N.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
)A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
